key_facts: Omniman defeated the Guardians in episode one without significant resistance.
Dark Wing had no flying ability but attempted to attack Omniman mid-air.
Red Rush was killed in under one second during the fight with Omniman.
Green Ghost was killed by Omniman with a five knuckle shuffle punch.
War Woman used her mace in combat and received a sound effect on impact.
Martian Man held down Omniman briefly while others gained an advantage.
Monster Girl is a 24-year-old woman who appears as a 12-year-old due to a curse.
Rex Risher was cloned by Angel, who then assumed his identity at his funeral.
Duplicate has the power to create duplicates of herself and other beings.
Black Samson is bald and voiced by Cyborg Duay.
The Guardians were assembled to protect Earth from global threats.
Shorty's suit is non-breathable and lacks any design elements.
Immortal's head is a backbling in Fortnite.
Kate is described as being made of tissue paper and easily destroyed in fights.
Shake Smith is a top-five invincible character in the series.
key_opinions: The Guardians are poorly designed and ineffective against Omniman.
Dark Wing’s attempt to fight Omniman was foolish given his lack of flight ability.
Red Rush’s death was too quick and lacked dramatic weight.
Green Ghost’s role in the fight was minimal and unimpressive.
Shorty’s fashion design is lazy and uninspired.
Monster Girl is not strong enough to warrant attention or respect.
Angel’s funeral speech is self-serving and insincere.
Duplicate and Kate are among the most hated characters in the show.
Martian Man’s contribution was meaningful despite limited screen time.
Black Samson is a respected leader and warrior.
Rex Risher’s legacy is overshadowed by the clone narrative.
Immortal is overrated and often acts arrogantly.
War Woman’s fighting style is impressive and well-executed.
Shake Smith is hilarious and entertaining despite his flaws.
The Guardians fail to live up to their purpose as Earth’s defenders.
key_datapoints: Omniman killed Red Rush in under 1 second.
Green Ghost was struck with a five knuckle shuffle punch.
Immortal’s decapitated head appears as a Fortnite backbling.
Eight doleight dollars would be earned if every decapitation were monetized.
War Woman’s mace produces a distinct sound effect on impact.
Monster Girl appears 12 years old despite being 24 in age.
Rex Risher was cloned by Angel after his death.
Duplicate can create multiple copies of herself and others.
Black Samson is voiced by Cyborg Duay.
Martian Man held down Omniman for a brief period during battle.
Shake Smith ran on a treadmill backwards in a memorable scene.
One character survived a bullet to the head and later died.
A single Guardian lasted only one page in the comics before being defeated.
The fight with Omniman occurred in real-time, not slow motion.
Omniman returned home immediately after defeating the Guardians.
